runs.comm: good start from Mash. It was short-of-length delivery curving away from Gambhir who tried to dab it to third man and is beaten
similar delivery, perhaps not moving away so much, and Gambhir gets close to the line to cut it away through point for the first boundary of the game
fuller, a tad slower, Gambhir moves forward to tap it close on the off side and rushes across for a quick single
Rohit starts off with a confident creamy little cover drive. He moved forward to time the length delivery through extra cover
130.4 kmph length delivery that straightens on the off stump, Rohit pushes at it and edges it to third man
the slower one, the off break, Gambhir waits before turning it behind square leg
on a length, around the off stump, defended to the off side
The crowd roar as Gambhir leans into a extra-cover drive. It was too full and width on offer as well
much better delivery, on a length and curving into the body, Gambhir tries to work it to the on side and is hit on the thigh pad
141 kmph lovely delivery moving away from back of length and past the attempted dab to third man. The keeper collects ....
138.1 kmph bouncer on the leg stump line, Gambhir can't connect with the pull shot.
fuller, around 139 kmph delivery on the legs, turned to deep backward square leg for a single

good delivery, straightening on the middle and off line, jabbed close on the off side .. Gambhir looks up  and Rohit calls him over for a quick single. The point fielder rushed in, dived forward and under-armed a throw. Rohit dived into his crease. The throw didnt' find the stumps but perhaps, Rohit would have made it in time
stands up tall to play a neat little punchy on-the-up drive but straight to cover
slightly slower, length delivery on the off stump, worked to mid-on
goes for a big slog and is beaten. Rohit charged down the wicket and went for a big hit over the infield but couldn't connect
back of length, around off stump, tapped to the on side of the pitch and they scamper across for a quick single
walks down the track, meets the slower one almost on the full and pushes it to wide mid-off

dropped by Raqibul Hossain at backward point. Shahadat oohs and aahs. It was short in length, moving away from Gambhir who cuts it to the right of Raqibul who dives to his right but couldn't hold on ... Not an easy chance...

Almost caught at deep square leg by Mashrafee. A fine effort. Rohit had flicked a full delivery in the air and Mash, stationed at the boundary, leaped up but couldn't quite get his palms around the ball ...
drops it short and outside off, Rohit flashes it away in style past point

The frenetic nervous energy continues to spill over. Rohit moves down the track, Shahadat shortens the length, Rohit goes for the pull and edges it but well short of the third man fielder. Agony for Shahadat. He has created chances but nothing has gone straight to hands...
released with a grunt but slips the ball down the leg side
kicks up from short of length, Gambhir gets up on his toes, drops the ball close on the off side and they get across in time to complete the single
cutting in from outside off, with bounce, Rohit is cramped but adjusts by taking th bottom-hand off the handle and stabs the ball to the off side
short in length, on the middle and leg, tapped to the on side

loud shout for lbw but negated .. It skidded on from back of length, from just outside off and moved towards middle. Rohit went for the pull and was hit on the thigh. The ball would have just gone over the middle stump
backs away to drag it past square leg
charges down the track, moves outside leg stump line the process and cuts the short-of-length delivery through the off side
slower one, outside off stump,. Gambhir hangs on the back foot to dab it down to third man
yet another slower one, lands on a length around off stump, pushed towards wide mid-on for a single

a fierce thump! It was full in length and on the middle stump line, Rohit leaned forward to swing it high over midwicket .. He stood and watched the ball sail over the boundary. He played a similar shot in the warm-up game against Pakistan as well.

And there he goes again..   This time he fetched the short-of-length delivery from outside off and heaved it over the on side field ... not as cleanly struck as the previous one but he cleared the infield comfortably
Rubel responds with a bouncer and Rohit tries to upper cut it but doesn't connect
shuffles across to try play the lap shot around the corner and edges it to short fine-leg region
lifting delivery outside off stump, chopped to third man
139.9 kmph bouncer over the middle stump, Gambhir tries to upper cut it to third man but can't reach.
the offspinner starts from round the stumps. Slow through the air, on the middle, punched to long-on
nice loopy delivery curving towards the off stump , defended to the off side
slightly short, Gambhir cuts but is slightly early into the shot and mistimes it to cover
from over the wicket, slightly short and skids on towards middle, mistimes the pull shot for a single
from round the stumps, floated full on the off stump line, Rohit moves outside leg stump and ends up slicing it off the outer edge through  backward point
leans forward to retain the strike with a push to long-on. Good over from Mahmudullah
stumping chance missed by Mushfiqur. Easy chance too. Rohit Sharma was left stranded mid-way by the left-arm spinner but Mushy fluffed .. He didn't collect cleanly and couldn't recover in time
Shakib Al Hasan, the No 1 ODI allrounder in the game, does the trick with a lovely skidding ball. Rohit went for the pull but found his middle stump missing. It skidded on quickly towards its target.
leans forward to drive through the off side for a single
turning in from just outside off, stabbed to the off side
dabbed to backward square leg for a single
lunges forward to pick a single to cover point. Superb over from Shakib comes to an end. He should have got Rohit stumped but got his man next ball.
short of length outside off stump, punched to deep point for couple for runs
the bouncer over the middle stump and Dhoni ducks.. The keeper collects and shouts words of encouragement to Shahadat.
fuller, on the off stump, driven to mid-off for a single
short in length, moving across Gambhir who cuts it to past the diving backward point who gets a hand on it (not a catch .. bump ball) and Gambhir comes back for the second run
a tad fuller, just outside off stump, dabbed to third man
full in length, on the middle, worked towards wide long-on region for two runs
tossed up middle stump and he paddles it to short fine leg
gives himself room and hits a wider ball square on the off side

tossed up on the stumps, Gambhir gets into position and nudges the ball toward gully and sets off, then there's a bit of hesitation and the batsmen have to really hustle, a very hard and flat throw comes back to Mushfiqur who rattles the stumps but Gambhir just back in time
flat ball, a tad short, he looks to pull but mistimes the shot
short again, leg stump or so, and he nudges it away for one
tosses it up on the pads, Dhoni knocks it wide of square leg
top shot that, just uses his feet to get to the pitch of this one and goes big, and even though its not off the middle of the bat he still clears long-off easily
comes out again, this time the bowler sees him and slows the pace and Dhoni has to adjust and push the ball into the off side for a quick single
short and wide, driven hard off the back foot to cover where Shakib dives and saves a couple runs, thats good fielding by the youngster
he's itching to dominate and charges down, the length is not on for that big shot and Gambhir gets a top edge that goes up for a while and somehow drops in no mans land
slower ball tossed up outside leg stump, he mistimes a sweep
quicker ball but too short so Dhoni gets up and punches past cover
walks into the on drive, gets it past square leg and comes back easily for the second run
steps down the track, Shakib drops it shorter and Gambhir adjust to lap it to short fine leg
moves down the track and drives to long-off
on the middle and leg stump line, Gambhir cuts to deep point
threatens to jump out, the bowler gets it to dip shorter, swatted away to the on side for a single
Shakib continues to be difficult to put away. Perfect line and length. Gambhir can only tap it past square leg for a single

almost caught at short third man .... It curved in towards the off stump, Gambhir was cramped up but managed to cut it .. it went off the edge but clear of the diving fielder and ran away to the boundary
tries to dab it to cover point and edges it to fine-leg
moves down the track, tries for the big hit but ends up jabbing it past the bowler
rocks back to chop the slightly short of length over extra cover for couple of runs
just outside off, cut away to deep backward point but Gambhir slips while turning at the non-striker's end and so, they settle for a single
skids on towards the off stump, Dhoni backs away, again can't get much power behind it and hits it straight to cover fielder. It needed a direct hit to run him out ...
length delivery on the off stump, Dhoni goes hard at the ball again but hits it straight to long-off
slightly short, backs away to cut to deep point
just outside off stump, dabbed down to third man. Again, just a single. Bangladesh doing a fine job here.
the slower one on the middle, moves outside leg stump and crashes it straight to deep cover
Dhoni is struggling to get the big hits going. He goes for the pull but ends up swatting it weakly to midwicket for a single
on the off and middle line, clears the front foot and pulls it wide of long-on and runs hard to come back for the second
another mistimed pull, just a single. 111 for 1
moves down the track and drives along the ground to cover for a single
Naeem has cleaned up Dhoni.  It was floated up full, Dhoni charged out but the ball dipped on him rapidly, went under the flashing blade and on to the stumps.
leans well forward to defend it down the pitch
almost in the blockhole, dug out back to the bowler. Musfiqur shouts,"Oh beautiful!"
worked to backward square leg for a single. Superb over from Naeem Islam.
flighted on the middle and leg, turned past square leg

comes down the track and Shakib gets it to land shorter, Yuvraj lunges forward to push it to the off side. Gambhir was down the wicket and turns back to dive into the crease. He loses his bat but manages to get his hand in
stumping missed. Seeing Yuvraj charge down the track, Shakib fired it outside leg but Mush couldn't gather cleanly.
slightly short in length outside off stump, Yuvraj flashed it past point for a boundary ...
leans forward to push it away for a single
And Yuvraj Singh goes for the big hit over midwicket. It was floated full on the legs and he picked it up cleanly over the boundary. Nice easy swing of the bat
flighted full again and Yuvraj uses the bottom-hand to good effect this time and lifts it over long-on. Two in two. Yuvraj has started to do what he is known for.
lovely delivery from Naeem. He slowed it up .. really slow through the air ,, pushed away to the off side
oh he drags it really short this time and Yuvraj rocks back to pull it high over midwicket. Thrid six of the over and suddenly, the scorecard shoots up like a hot thermometer
worked through the on side for a single
Gambhir falls. He chipped down the track and tried to lift it over cover but couldn't clear the fielder stationed there.
banged in short and it slips down the leg side
Yuvraj Singh take a bow ... That golf like swing is on show again. It was a low full toss and Yuvraj swings it over long-on
short-pitched delivery at the ribcage but Yuvraj swivels to lap it around the corner. The ball finds the deep backward square leg boundary...
again on the thigh pad .. Yuvraj just helps it around the corner past the short fine-leg fielder ... Bangladesh who did so well before Yuvraj came on are struggling a touch now.
And another one slipping down the leg side ....
That's a good bouncer. Sharp and well-directed on the middle and Yuvraj was beaten for pace, while going for the pull shot.
drifts outside leg again but this time time they have dropped back the short fine-leg and will give away just a single
full and straight, on the middle, pushed back down the pitch

Shahadat roars! Yuvraj is gone. Yuvraj cleared the front foot and went for the six to the straight boundary but ended up slicing it high in the air and the fielder rushed in from long-off to hold the catch. Big wicket. Yusuf walks out.
yorker length outside off, Raina tries to reach out but can't connect
full again, outside off stump, good delivery, punched out towards long-off
It wasn't a bad delivery but Raina has put it away. He opened up his stance, fetched the really full delivery from off stump and placed it wide of mid-on
full and outside off stump, Raina goes down on his knee to crash it to right of deep cover where Raqibul makes a fine diving stop to prevent the boundary. Shahadat applauds the effort
full and straight, goes for the swipe across the line and edges it to his pad and to short fine-leg region ...
full delivery, almost at the blockhole - good stuff from the youngster - dug out through covers for a single
full and straight again, on the middle and off stump line, Yusuf hits it to mid-on and Mash stops it at mid-on
sharp bouncer that climbs over Raina and Taufel signals wide .. it was over Raina's head ..
Rubel doesn't even celebrate after knocking out Raina's stumps.. It was full, it was fast and it burst through Raina's attempted on-side swipe.
Irfan connects first ball and the two brothers celebrate in the middle. Big smiles in their faces. It was on the legs and he swung it high over deep square leg boundary
length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Irfan clears the front foot and heaves it over midwicket
slower one on the pads, Irfan is early through his shot and the ball rolls off the pad to backward square leg .
